mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resourceGroup( groupNum, groupName) VALUES(resourceGroup_seq.NEXTVAL, #{groupName})
mapper.update: UPDATE resourceGroup SET groupName = #{groupName} WHERE groupNum = #{groupNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resourceList( resourceNum, groupNum, resourceName, color, occupancy) VALUES(resourceList_seq.NEXTVAL, #{groupNum}, #{resourceName}, #{color}, #{occupancy})
mapper.select: SELECT resourceNum, groupNum, resourceName, color, occupancy FROM resourceList WHERE resourceNum = #{resourceNum}

SELECT resourceNum id, rl.groupNum, groupName, resourceName title, color eventColor, occupancy FROM resourceList rl JOIN resourceGroup rg ON rl.groupNum = rg.groupNum ORDER BY rl.groupNum, resourceNum
SELECT resourceNum, resourceName, occupancy FROM resourceList WHERE groupNum=#{groupNum} ORDER BY resourceNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resourceScheduler( num, resourceNum, userId, title, startDay, endDay, startTime, endTime, inwon) VALUES(resourceScheduler_seq.NEXTVAL, #{resourceNum}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{startDay}, #{endDay}, #{startTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inwon})
mapper.update: UPDATE resourceScheduler SET resourceNum=#{resourceNum}, title=#{title}, startDay=#{startDay}, endDay=#{endDay}, startTime=#{startTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endTime=#{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inwon=#{inwon} WHERE num = #{num} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT num, resourceNum, r.userId, userName, title, startDay, endDay, startTime, endTime, inwon, created FROM resourceScheduler r JOIN member1 m ON r.userId=m.userId WHERE num = #{num}

SELECT num id, groupName, rs.resourceNum resourceId, title, NVL2(startTime, startDay||'T'||startTime, startDay) "start", NVL2(endTime, endDay||'T'||endTime, endDay) "end", startDay, startTime, endDay, endTime, rs.userId, userName, occupancy, resourceName, rl.groupNum, inwon FROM resourceScheduler rs JOIN resourceList rl ON rs.resourceNum = rl.resourceNum JOIN resourceGroup rg ON rl.groupNum = rg.groupNum JOIN member1 m ON rs.userId = m.userId WHERE TO_DATE(startDay, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{start} AND TO_DATE(endDay, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{end} ORDER BY groupNum, resourceId, num
